body: So, I'm working on a Nebula map and I have one side of the map done. Is there any way I can flip it over to the other side? If so please explain Thanks.
body_tagged: So, I'm working on a Nebula map and I have one side of the map done. Is there any way I can flip it over to the other side? If so please explain Thanks.
title: Map Building Help.

replies.body: Ask Rilo he knows how to with world edit
replies.body_tagged: Ask Rilo he knows how to with world edit

replies.body:
With world edit, make your region by:
- Using the axe
- Or typing //pos1 and //pos2 
both in the respective corners to make a cube.

Then, where the front-center of your completed side is, type //copy.
Then type //rotate 180
Move to the front center of the non existent side, and type //paste

Expect lag, but it will paste.

replies.body:
April's answer is pretty accurate, I will proceed to lock this topic to prevent
forum spam. 

If you need any further help, don't hesitate to contact me on Skype or another mapdev :)
